it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game

Class GameTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game.GameTable

  • public class GameTable
extends java.lang.Object
    The game table is the place where the match is made; it contains the the deck; players can play their cards on it; the match trump is saved on it; it keep track of the match turns.
